exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : nat -> R x : R H1 : ex_pseries a x H2 : ex_pseries b x Unable to unify "PSeries ?M2363 ?M2365 = PSeries ?M2364 ?M2365" with "PSeries (PS_plus a b) x = PSeries a x + PSeries b x".
The reference PS_minus was not found in the current environment.
Found no subterm matching "zero" in the current goal.

In environment H : forall (a b : nat -> R) (x : R), (forall n : nat, a n = b n) -> PSeries a x = PSeries b x a, b : nat -> R x, x0 : R H0 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (b k)) x0 x1 : R H2 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) x1 H3 : forall x2 : ?G, plus x2 (opp x2) = zero Unable to unify "PSeries a x + PSeries b x" with "PSeries (fun n : nat => plus (a n) (b n)) x".

original: intros H1 H2. apply PSeries_ext. intro n. unfold PS_minus. rewrite <- plus_opp_r. reflexivity.
